EapsDomainMode.name: EapsDomainMode
EapsDomainMode.description: Indicates the configured mode of an EAPS domain.

EapsMbrVlanType.name: EapsMbrVlanType
EapsMbrVlanType.description: Indicates the type of vlan, whether it is control or protected vlan, that is being added to the EAPS domain.

EapsPortType.name: EapsPortType
EapsPortType.description: Indicates the ring port of the EAPS domains. The ring port can be primary or secondary. This is used to specify which port is being unconfigured.

EapsDomainState.name: EapsDomainState
EapsDomainState.description: The operational state of an EAPS domain. The states complete(1), failed(2), init(6), precomplete(7), and preinit(8) apply only to domains configured as master. The states linksup(3), linkdown(4) and preforwarding(5) apply only to domains configured as transit. The state init(0) applys to domains configured as either master or transit.

EapsDomainPortStatus.name: EapsDomainPortStatus
EapsDomainPortStatus.description: The operational state of an EAPS domain's ring-ports. If the state is unknown (0), it indicates the domain is still not up yet. The valid states are up(1), down(2), blocked(3).

EapsFailTimerExpiryAction.name: EapsFailTimerExpiryAction
EapsFailTimerExpiryAction.description: The action to take when the failed timer expires. If action is configured to sendAlert(0), and the fail expires, the Master will remain in Complete or Init state, and a trap - extremeEapsFailTimerExpFlagSet - will be sent. When this fail timer stops expiring another trap - extremeEapsFailTimerExpFlagClear - will be sent. If the action is configured to openSecondaryPort(1), and the fail timer expires, the Master's state will be set to Failed, and it will open the secondary port.

EapsSharedPortState.name: EapsSharedPortState
EapsSharedPortState.description: The operational state of an EAPS Shared-Port instance. The states are idle(0), ready(1), blocking(2), and preforwarding(3).

EapsSharedPortMode.name: EapsSharedPortMode
EapsSharedPortMode.description: If the mode is unconfigured(0), it indicates the EAPS shared port's mode has yet to be configured. The valid configured modes of an EAPS Shared-port are controller(1) and partner(2)

EapsSharedPortSegmentTimerExpiryAction.name: EapsSharedPortSegmentTimerExpiryAction
EapsSharedPortSegmentTimerExpiryAction.description: The action to take when the EAPS Shared-port's segment timer expires. If action is configured to sendAlert(0), and the segment timer expires, the segment's status will remain in Up state, and a trap - extremeEapsSegmentTimerExpFlagSet - will be sent. When this segment timer stops expiring another trap - extremeEapsSegmentTimerExpFlagClear - will be sent. If the action is configured to segmentDown(1), and the segment timer expires, the segment's status will be set to Down.

EapsSharedPortNeighborStatus.name: EapsSharedPortNeighborStatus
EapsSharedPortNeighborStatus.description: The operational status of an EAPS Shared-port's neighbor reachabilty. The states are neighborDown(0), neighborUp(1), and neighborError(2).

EapsSharedPortRootBlockerStatus.name: EapsSharedPortRootBlockerStatus
EapsSharedPortRootBlockerStatus.description: The operational status of an EAPS Shared-port's Root- Blocker. The states are false(0), active(1), and inactive(2).

EapsSharedPortSegmentStatus.name: EapsSharedPortSegmentStatus
EapsSharedPortSegmentStatus.description: The operational status of an EAPS Shared-port's segments. The states are unknown(0), segUp(1), segDown(2), segBlockingUp(3) and segBlockingDown(4).

EapsSharedPortVlanPortStatus.name: EapsSharedPortVlanPortStatus
EapsSharedPortVlanPortStatus.description: The operational status of an EAPS Shared-port's vlan-port. The states are unknown(0), activeOpen(1), blocked(2), open(3) and down(4).

EapsDomainPriority.name: EapsDomainPriority
EapsDomainPriority.description: Indicates the configured priority of an EAPS domain.

extremeEapsTable.name: extremeEapsTable
extremeEapsTable.description: This table contains EAPS information about all EAPS domains on this device.

extremeEapsEntry.name: extremeEapsEntry
extremeEapsEntry.description: An individual entry of this table contains EAPS information related to that EAPS domain.

extremeEapsMode.name: extremeEapsMode
extremeEapsMode.description: This indicates the mode of the EAPS domain.

extremeEapsState.name: extremeEapsState
extremeEapsState.description: This indicates the current EAPS state of this EAPS domain.

extremeEapsFailedFlag.name: extremeEapsFailedFlag
extremeEapsFailedFlag.description: This indicates the status of the failed flag. If the failed timer expires while its expiry action is configured to sendAlert, this failed flag is set. It is then cleared when the failed timer stops expiring, or the expiry action is configured to openSecondaryPort.

extremeEapsEnabled.name: extremeEapsEnabled
extremeEapsEnabled.description: This indicated if this domain has been enabled or not.

extremeEapsPrimaryPort.name: extremeEapsPrimaryPort
extremeEapsPrimaryPort.description: This indicates the EAPS domain's primary ring-port. Value of 0 indicates the primary port is still not configured

extremeEapsSecondaryPort.name: extremeEapsSecondaryPort
extremeEapsSecondaryPort.description: This indicates the EAPS domain's secondary ring-port. Value of 0 indicates the secondary port is still not configured

extremeEapsHelloTimer.name: extremeEapsHelloTimer
extremeEapsHelloTimer.description: This indicates the EAPS domain's hello timer's value in seconds.

extremeEapsFailedTimer.name: extremeEapsFailedTimer
extremeEapsFailedTimer.description: This indicates the EAPS domain's failed timer's value in seconds.

extremeEapsFailedTimerExpiryAction.name: extremeEapsFailedTimerExpiryAction
extremeEapsFailedTimerExpiryAction.description: This indicates the action taken by the domain when the fail timer expires. If the action is to sendAlert, then a SNMP trap - extremeEapsFailTimerExpFlagSet - will be sent, and the secondary port will continue to remain in blocking state. If the action is to openSecondaryPort, then the secondary port will open and be set to forwarding state.

extremeEapsUnconfigRingPort.name: extremeEapsUnconfigRingPort
extremeEapsUnconfigRingPort.description: This specifies which EAPS domain port is being unconfigured. Value of 1, indicates unconfigure the primary port. Value of 2, indicates unconfigure secondary port.

extremeEapsPrimaryStatus.name: extremeEapsPrimaryStatus
extremeEapsPrimaryStatus.description: This indicates the status of the EAPS domain's primary ring-port.

extremeEapsSecondaryStatus.name: extremeEapsSecondaryStatus
extremeEapsSecondaryStatus.description: This indicates the status of the EAPS domain's secondary ring-port.

extremeEapsProtectedVlansCount.name: extremeEapsProtectedVlansCount
extremeEapsProtectedVlansCount.description: This gives the count of the number of vlans that are being protected by this EAPS domain.

extremeEapsRowStatus.name: extremeEapsRowStatus
extremeEapsRowStatus.description: The status of this entry as per standard RowStatus conventions.

extremeEapsHelloTimerMs.name: extremeEapsHelloTimerMs
extremeEapsHelloTimerMs.description: This indicates the milliseconds portion of the EAPS domain's hello timer value in milliseconds.

extremeEapsPriority.name: extremeEapsPriority
extremeEapsPriority.description: This gives the priority of the domain. Used along with spatial re-use to prioritize handling of domains during a topology change.

extremeEapsPrevState.name: extremeEapsPrevState
extremeEapsPrevState.description: This indicates the previous EAPS state of this EAPS domain. Used in state change traps information.

extremeEapsGlobalEnabled.name: extremeEapsGlobalEnabled
extremeEapsGlobalEnabled.description: Indicates if EAPS is enabled globally on the switch.

extremeEapsGlobalFastConvergence.name: extremeEapsGlobalFastConvergence
extremeEapsGlobalFastConvergence.description: Indicates if Fast Convergence is enabled globally on the switch.

extremeEapsLastConfigurationChange.name: extremeEapsLastConfigurationChange
extremeEapsLastConfigurationChange.description: Indicates the last time there was any change in EAPS configuration on the switch.

extremeEapsLastStatusChange.name: extremeEapsLastStatusChange
extremeEapsLastStatusChange.description: Indicates the last time there was any change in EAPS domain, EAPS port, shared port, or segment status on the switch. Time changes for extremeEapsState, extremeEapsSharedPortState, extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentStatus, extremeEapsFailedFlag, extremeEapsPrimaryStatus, extremeEapsSecondaryStatus, extremeEapsSharedPortNbrStatus, extremeEapsSharedPortRootBlockerStatus, extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentFlagFailed.

extremeEapsStatusTrapCount.name: extremeEapsStatusTrapCount
extremeEapsStatusTrapCount.description: Indicates the number of status traps sent out since the switch booted. Status traps counted include extremeEapsSharedPortStateChange extremeEapsRootBlockerStatusChange extremeEapsPortStatusChange extremeEapsStateChange extremeEapsFailTimerExpFlagSet extremeEapsFailTimerExpFlagClear.

extremeEapsGlobalMulticastAddRingPorts.name: extremeEapsGlobalMulticastAddRingPorts
extremeEapsGlobalMulticastAddRingPorts.description: Ring ports are added to existing multicast groups for protected vlans on a topology change event.

extremeEapsGlobalMulticastSendIGMPQuery.name: extremeEapsGlobalMulticastSendIGMPQuery
extremeEapsGlobalMulticastSendIGMPQuery.description: IGMP Query is sent out on all protected vlans on a topology change event.

extremeEapsGlobalMulticastTempFlooding.name: extremeEapsGlobalMulticastTempFlooding
extremeEapsGlobalMulticastTempFlooding.description: Temporary Multicast flooding occurs on all protected vlans on a topology change event.

extremeEapsGlobalMulticastTempFloodingDu.name: extremeEapsGlobalMulticastTempFloodingDuration
extremeEapsGlobalMulticastTempFloodingDu.description: The duration at which temporary Multicast flooding will occur.

extremeEapsMbrVlanTable.name: extremeEapsMbrVlanTable
extremeEapsMbrVlanTable.description: This table contains the control and all protected vlans added to each EAPS domain on this device. There can be only 1 control vlan, while many protected vlans added to a EAPS domain.

extremeEapsMbrVlanEntry.name: extremeEapsMbrVlanEntry
extremeEapsMbrVlanEntry.description: An individual entry of this table correlates a EAPS domain with a VLAN added to it and its type whether it is control or protected.

extremeEapsMbrVlanType.name: extremeEapsMbrVlanType
extremeEapsMbrVlanType.description: The member VLAN's type whether it is control or protected.

extremeEapsMbrVlanTag.name: extremeEapsMbrVlanTag
extremeEapsMbrVlanTag.description: The member VLAN's Vlan Id tag.

extremeEapsMbrVlanRowStatus.name: extremeEapsMbrVlanRowStatus
extremeEapsMbrVlanRowStatus.description: The status of this entry as per standard RowStatus conventions.

extremeEapsSharedPortTable.name: extremeEapsSharedPortTable
extremeEapsSharedPortTable.description: This table contains all EAPS shared ports configured on this device.

extremeEapsSharedPortEntry.name: extremeEapsSharedPortEntry
extremeEapsSharedPortEntry.description: An individual entry of this table describes the configuration of an EAPS shared port.

extremeEapsSharedPortIfIndex.name: extremeEapsSharedPortIfIndex
extremeEapsSharedPortIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of a port configured as an EAPS shared port.

extremeEapsSharedPortMode.name: extremeEapsSharedPortMode
extremeEapsSharedPortMode.description: The configured mode of the EAPS shared port.

extremeEapsSharedPortLinkId.name: extremeEapsSharedPortLinkId
extremeEapsSharedPortLinkId.description: The configured Link Id for the EAPS shared port. Each common link in the entire network will be assigned a unique link Id. Each shared-port instance on either end of this common link will be configured with this link Id. Value of 0 indicates the link Id is still not configured.

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTimerExpiryA.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTimerExpiryAction
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTimerExpiryA.description: This indicates the action taken by the EAPS Shared port instance when a segment timer expires. If the action is sendAlert, then when the segment timer expires, an SNMP trap will be sent, and the segment will remain in Up state, with the failed flag set to True. If the action is segmentDown, then when the timer expires, the segment will be set to Down state.

extremeEapsSharedPortState.name: extremeEapsSharedPortState
extremeEapsSharedPortState.description: This indicates the state of the EAPS Shared port instance. The states can be idle(0), ready(1), blocking(2), and preforwarding(3).

extremeEapsSharedPortNbrStatus.name: extremeEapsSharedPortNbrStatus
extremeEapsSharedPortNbrStatus.description: This indicates the status of reachabilty to the neighbor on the other end of the Shared-segment. If the neighbor on the other end is reachable with matching link-id and different modes, then the status is NeighborUp. If the neighbor is not reachable, this status is NeighborDown. If the neighbor is reachable, but with the same mode, then this status is set to Error.

extremeEapsSharedPortDomainsCount.name: extremeEapsSharedPortDomainsCount
extremeEapsSharedPortDomainsCount.description: This gives the count of the number of EAPS domains that are sharing this shared-port.

extremeEapsSharedPortProtectedVlansCount.name: extremeEapsSharedPortProtectedVlansCount
extremeEapsSharedPortProtectedVlansCount.description: This gives the count of the number of vlans that are being protected by this shared-port instance.

extremeEapsSharedPortRootBlockerStatus.name: extremeEapsSharedPortRootBlockerStatus
extremeEapsSharedPortRootBlockerStatus.description: If this shared port instance is not in Root blocker state, the status is False. If the shared port is in Root blocker state, and its path detect message is being returned to it, it is in Active state. If the shared port is in Root blocker state, but its path detect message is not making it back to itself, then its root blocker status is Inactive.

extremeEapsSharedPortRootBlockerId.name: extremeEapsSharedPortRootBlockerId
extremeEapsSharedPortRootBlockerId.description: This is the Link Id of the Root Blocker in the entire network. If there is no root blocker in the network, this value is 65535.

extremeEapsSharedPortRowStatus.name: extremeEapsSharedPortRowStatus
extremeEapsSharedPortRowStatus.description: The status of this entry as per standard RowStatus conventions.

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentHealthInterv.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentHealthInterval
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentHealthInterv.description: Interval at which health check PDUs are sent out each segment port.

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTimeout.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTimeout
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTimeout.description: Time in seconds where segment fail timer expires, fail flag is set, and expiry action is taken.

extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathFailedFla.name: extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathFailedFlag
extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathFailedFla.description: Shared port link fail timer expired, but our shared port link is up.

extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathHealthInt.name: extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathHealthInterval
extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathHealthInt.description: Interval at which health check PDUs are sent out shared port.

extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathTimeout.name: extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathTimeout
extremeEapsSharedPortCommonPathTimeout.description: Time in seconds where shared link fail timer expires and fail flag is set

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTable.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTable
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentTable.description: This table contains the EAPS shared port's segments information

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentEntry.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentEntry
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentEntry.description: An individual entry of this table describes the EAPS shared port's segment information. It will describe the EAPS domain, the segment's status, and other information related to neighboring node's blocking status.

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentPort.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentPort
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentPort.description: The segment port on a segment which is part of an EAPS shared port.

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentStatus.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentStatus
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentStatus.description: The status of a segment port which is part of an EAPS shared port.

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentFailedFlag.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentFailedFlag
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentFailedFlag.description: The status of the failed flag on a segment port which is part of an EAPS shared port. This flag will be set to TRUE if the segment's fail timer expiry action is set to sendAlert, and this timer expires

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentVlanPortCoun.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentVlanPortCount
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentVlanPortCoun.description: The count of vlan ports being protected under this segment's EAPS domain.

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentAdjId.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentAdjId
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentAdjId.description: The link Id of a neighboring node if the neighbor's shared port instance was in blocking state.

extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentRBD.name: extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentRBD
extremeEapsSharedPortSegmentRBD.description: The Root Blocker Id as determined by the neighboring node's shared port instance.

extremeEapsSharedPortVlanTable.name: extremeEapsSharedPortVlanTable
extremeEapsSharedPortVlanTable.description: This table contains all VLANs protected by the EAPS Shared Port instance.

extremeEapsSharedPortVlanEntry.name: extremeEapsSharedPortVlanEntry
extremeEapsSharedPortVlanEntry.description: An individual entry of this table correlates a EAPS Shared port instance with a VLAN protected by it.

extremeEapsSharedPortVlanName.name: extremeEapsSharedPortVlanName
extremeEapsSharedPortVlanName.description: The vlan being protected under this EAPS Shared port instance

extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortCount.name: extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortCount
extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortCount.description: The count of vlan ports being protected under this vlan

extremeEapsSharedPortVlanActiveOpenPort.name: extremeEapsSharedPortVlanActiveOpenPort
extremeEapsSharedPortVlanActiveOpenPort.description: Segment port that is Active Open. If there is no Active open port, then this value is 0.

extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortTable.name: extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortTable
extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortTable.description: This table contains the EAPS shared port's vlan-port's information

extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortEntry.name: extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortEntry
extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortEntry.description: An individual entry of this table describes the EAPS shared port's vlan port information. It will describe the status of the vlan port under its protection.

extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortStatus.name: extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortStatus
extremeEapsSharedPortVlanPortStatus.description: The status of a vlan port which is getting protected by an EAPS shared port.

comments: Produced by pysmi-0.3.4 at Tue Apr 20 16:47:57 2021
